Locals Sushi & Sports Pub in Mount Pleasant, SC
LOCALS SUSHI & SPORTS PUB 1150 Queensborough Blvd, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464 Get Directions Monday,Friday, Saturday : 11 AM–11 PM Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Sunday : 11 AM–10 PM Call (843) 388-5114 GET EMAIL OFFERS, COUPONS & MORE! Choose Location (Required) Mt. Pleasant James Island West Ashley Email (Required) Read our Reviews View Specials 
Locals Sushi & Sports Pub in Mount Pleasant, SC offers award-winning sushi, delicious tacos, an extensive drink menu, and more. We’ve got tons of TVs for all your sporting events.

[Page Title: Locals Sushi & Sports Pub]

Skip to content 
AWARD-WINNING SUSHI
View Menu 
3 LOCATIONS TO SERVE YOU!
View Menu 
Locals Sushi & Sports Pub now has 3 locations to serve you in Mt. Pleasant, West Ashley and James Island, SC.

want something besides Sushi?

We have an amazing selection of tacos, hibachi and wings. All your favorite food, drinks, tons of TVs and sports packages!

MT. P

MT. P

MENU VIEW SPECIALS LOCATION INFO

MENU VIEW SPECIALS LOCATION INFO 
Awesome Happy Hour in Charleston, SC. 3 Locations.

Locals Sushi & Sports Pub offers some of the best happy hour and weekly specials in the Greater Charleston area along with great live music and your favorite sporting events!

Need catering?
We’ve got you!

Locals Sushi & Sports Pub can fulfill all of your catering needs from Locals Sushi & Sports Pub catering & bartending services to full BBQs, oyster roasts and even weddings.
